title: Software Engineer
description: We are looking for a skilled Software Engineer to join our team in Dubai. The ideal candidate should have experience in web development and a passion for technology.

title: Project Manager
description: Aziz Recruiters is seeking a Project Manager to oversee various projects in the Middle East. Strong leadership and communication skills are required.

title: Graphic Designer
description: Join our creative team as a Graphic Designer. You will be responsible for creating visual content for our clients in the Middle East.

title: Data Analyst
description: We are looking for a Data Analyst to help us make data-driven decisions. The role requires strong analytical skills and experience with data visualization tools.

title: Sales Executive
description: Aziz Recruiters is hiring a Sales Executive to drive sales and build relationships with clients in the Middle East. Experience in sales is a plus.
